name: Sherlock Poker
description:
Rent's due at 221B Baker Street - it's time to make some money!

Use your superb skills of observation to identify the tells of your tablemates and shakedown the criminal underworld of Probably Steampunk 19th-Century London to win rent for the month!

(Did they have Texas Hold'em at this point? Did Texas even exist?  Mysteries for another day, detective!  Get out there and MAKE THAT GREEN)

Credits

  • Design and Code by AGuyNamedEdward
  • Art by Sammy Mahmoudi
  • Sound Design by Kris Olivares
  • Music by Rosko Vair
  • Featuring Kris Olivares as SHERLOCK
